review: The Redragon M690 PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse is a solid choice for anyone looking for a reliable and feature-rich gaming mouse. The ergonomic design and 8 programmable buttons make it user-friendly and versatile. The 2.4Ghz wireless connection and adjustable DPI levels ensure smooth performance and precision. At $24.99, it offers great value for money. While a few users have reported minor issues with battery life and connectivity, these are not significant enough to detract from the overall positive experience. Highly recommended for both gaming and general use.
